Articles.Content:
Anyone else having the game lock up while loading and switching focus to a browser or something else?

 

1. Almost every time I alt-tab to a different screen/window/whatever while the game loads or reverts to launch or whatever has a loading bar, the game will freeze and continuously remain in loading state. Requires restart of game and on one occasion restart of computer.

2. Additionally, I couldn't find any other bug report feature in game. 

 

Simple fix for 1: I don't switch to another window while loading. Okay, but there are a lot of games in which switching screens while loading works fine, and I'm not going to sit around and do nothing while the game is loading. 

Complex fix for 1: Devs come up with a super clever fix that continues to load the game while the game is not in focus. 

Entertaining fix for 1: I don't play the game at all and I go outside and practice juggling while walking down the sidewalk until I try to cross the street and get run over by an amazon delivery truck.

 

Simple fix for 2: I come here and report bugs. If this is the way, then this is the way.

Complex fix for 2: A bug report option is added to the game that let's us identify bugs and collect relevant information on the system and action being done. This is on my bucket wishlist.

Entertaining fix for 2: I come here and report bugs and add in pics of cats and dogs doing stupid things in the back of amazon delivery trucks that just ran over wandering jugglers.

 

Cheers!

OB
